message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to make a counteroffer of $1400000 for the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I've given it some thought, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $1550000. It's a fair price, considering the product's value and the market demand.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to make a counteroffer of $1525000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm now offering it to you for $1575000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me at this price.
Thank you for considering my offers, Alice. I would like to make a final counteroffer of $1562500 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already made significant concessions, and I need to get a better price for the product. I'm now offering it to you for $1600000. This is my last offer, and I expect you to meet me at this price.
